abstract: UBS, Switzerland’s biggest bank, said it hired analyst Naomi Takagi from JPMorgan Chase in a bid to expand its equity research business in Japan, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: UBS, Switzerland’s biggest bank, said it hired analyst Naomi Takagi from JPMorgan Chase in a bid to expand its equity research business in Japan, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: UBS, Switzerland’s biggest bank, said it hired analyst Naomi Takagi from JPMorgan Chase in a bid to expand its equity research business in Japan, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: UBS Said to Hire Analyst Naomi Takagi

abstract: JPMorgan Chase’s Jamie Dimon is known for his astute M.&A. sense, but his latest deal — the sale of his Chicago home — isn’t looking as hot as his purchase of Bear Stearns.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase’s Jamie Dimon is known for his astute M.&A. sense, but his latest deal — the sale of his Chicago home — isn’t looking as hot as his purchase of Bear Stearns.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase‘s Jamie Dimon has garnered plaudits for his exquisitely timed deal-making during the crisis, picking up Bear Stearns and Washington Mutual for a combined song.

headline.main: Dimon’s Latest Deal Shines a Little Less Brightly
